Module WitchHunt

Package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.std

package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.std
This package contains all classes of the Console view.

Central class for display :StdView

Console input is managed by the controllers of the fr.sos.witchhunt.controller package.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sos.witchhunt.view
    Root of the 'view' level of the Application's MVC architecture. The code of each concurrent view should be organized in its own package.
    fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui
    This package contains all classes of the Graphical User Interface view.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    InterruptibleStdInput
    Non-blocking console input reader.
    StdPlayerCreator
    Used to create one instance of Player based on standard input.
    StdView
    Central class of the console view, responsible for console display.
